data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Recife PE are in shooting range from this free kick.
Recife PE are coming forward and Jonathan Gomez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Goias at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 5, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a Recife PE throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 8, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Free kick Recife PE.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Goias in the half of Recife PE.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Goias.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
Iago Maidana of Recife PE smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Goias's area.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Marquinhos (Recife PE) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Goias at Ilha do Retiro.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in Goias.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in high up the field for Recife PE in Recife.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Recife PE drives forward and Ricardinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 30, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral blows against Recife PE's Jonathan Gomez for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jonathan Gomez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Recife PE.
In the minute 33, Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
Goias have a goal kick.
Goias's Juan Pintado misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Attention is being given to Goias’s Miguel Figueira and play has been suspended briefly.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Recife to check on Tadeu, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 38, Tadeu returns to the field for Goias after picking up a slight injury.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Recife PE's Elton is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 38, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Miguel Figueira is back on the pitch.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
In the minute 39, In Recife, Betinho of Recife PE is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goias's Vinicius Lopes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Elton for Recife PE drives towards goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 43, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Goias’s Jefferson is on his feet again at Ilha do Retiro.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Goias in the half of Recife PE.
The first-half is over.
Jefferson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The second-half has started.
Recife PE drive upfield and Elton gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goias defender.
In the minute 46, Daniel Paulista is making the team's first substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Leandro Barcia replacing Jonathan Gomez.
Mike is replacing Miguel Figueira for the away team.
In the minute 47, Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
Iago Maidana (Recife PE) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, In Recife Recife PE attack through Marquinhos. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Goias.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick Recife PE.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Luciano for Recife PE gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards Goias a goal kick.
Recife PE are pushing forward but Leandro Barcia's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 55, Recife PE's Betinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goias defender.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Goias.
Caju is on a sub for Jefferson for Goias.
Important block from the Goias defence as Marquinhos fires in a strike for Recife PE.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Leandro Barcia gives Recife PE a 1-0 lead in Recife.
That's a fine assist from Luciano.
In the minute 62, Goias have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Patric of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 63, Goias have a goal kick.
Goias to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 65, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a Goias throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Corner awarded to Goias.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In Recife Goias drive forward through Rafael Moura. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Gomes do Amaral.
In the minute 68, Own goal! Elton has scored at the wrong end to make it 1-1.
The match at Ilha do Retiro has been interrupted briefly for a check on David Duarte, who is down injured.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Patric (Recife PE) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ney Franco (Goias) has taken off David Duarte who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Fabio Sanches is the replacement.
Rafael Moura of Goias gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a second substitution, with Lucas Mugni replacing Ronaldo.
In the minute 74, The home team have replaced Elton with Hernane Brocador. This is the third substitution made today by Daniel Paulista.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in Recife PE.
In the minute 75, Goias are coming forward and Rafael Vaz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 76, Recife PE move into a 2-1 lead through a Marquinhos header.
Patric instrumental with a fine assist.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral waits before resuming play because Marquinhos for Recife PE is still down.
In the minute 79, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards Recife PE a goal kick.
The home team has substituted Marquinhos with Sander. Daniel Paulista is thus making his fourth change.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ignacio Jara is replacing Breno for Goias at Ilha do Retiro.
The away team replace Rafael Moura with Victor Andrade.
In the minute 82, Vinicius Gomes do Amaral awards the away team a throw-in.
Goias pushes forward through Ignacio Jara, whose finish on goal is saved.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 84, Goias attack but Caju's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a Recife PE throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 85, Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
Recife PE needs to be cautious. Goias have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 87, Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Goias's Victor Andrade gets in a shot on goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goias pushes forward through Rafael Vaz, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Goias.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Recife PE.
Free kick Recife PE.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Vinicius Gomes do Amaral signals a free kick to Goias.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Recife PE make their fifth substitution with Marcao Silva replacing Ricardinho.
